markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Phase Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=1159)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 106

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You point your finger and project a bolt of magical energy that stutters in and out of phase until it reaches the target. Make a ranged spell attack roll against your target's AC; if the target has any circumstance bonuses to AC (such as from a shield or [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459)), reduce that bonus by 2 for this attack. On a success, you deal 3d4 piercing damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The bolt's damage increases by 1d4.
name: Phase Bolt

---

<summary>
Fire a spike of magic that can pass through shields and cover

</summary>
summary: Fire a spike of magic that can pass through shields and cover
